name: Bat2exe
tagline: Convert any Batch File easily to an Executable
body:
![BAT2EXE](http://bat2exe.net/BAT2EXE_files/bat2exe_2_square.png)

### [BAT2EXE](http://bat2exe.net)
Convert any Batch File easily to an Executable

This Tool will help you to convert Batch Files [.bat]
including any other Files in a certain Folder
to an executable [.exe] file package.

![BAT2EXE Screenshot](http://bat2exe.net/BAT2EXE_files/shapeimage_2.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
